website_summaries.verdict: Simple-yet-elegant styling on this white, porcelain set consisting of creamer dispenser, sugar bowl with lid and spoon, and sugar packets holder.
pros: Complete tea or coffee setup, including creamer dispenser, sugar bowl with lid and spoon, and sugar packets holder
Shiny, white porcelain finish is elegant for special occasions or everyday use
Sweetener packets holder is unique addition and a tidy storage
cons: Some complaints of products arriving with one or more pieces broken
The sugar bowl could be larger

customer_reviews.title: The proportions are esthetically displeasing!
customer_reviews.text: This may seem like carping, but I think appearance, especially when it's something you place on your dining room table, should be important. I think the sugar bowl is entirely too small in proportion to the creamer. It's looks as though they belong to different sets. I didn't return it. It's too much trouble. I'll keep looking for a larger sugar bowl. I also think the tiny ceramic spoon is incongruous. I found a small metal one at Bed, Bath, & Beyond that's more utilitarian and doesn't require tweezers to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Rumplestiltskin

customer_reviews.title: This set is adorable. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: This set is adorable. Unfortunately, the sugar bowl is a bit small and out of scale with the creamer. However, I like the fact that it also comes with a container for sweetener. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: DC Review

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted; packaged nicely...A off white which is fine for my set of dishes. Would recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: I was in no way disappointed with it
customer_reviews.text: This set is just what I expected. I was in no way disappointed with it. The white comes close to matching my Winter Frost White Corelle dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyphoenix

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. We used them at an event that ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. We used them at an event that we gave on Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: lobo

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise all else was good.
customer_reviews.text: The spoon was broken when it arrived. Otherwise all else was good.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: A lovely set and just what I was looking for. There was a slight issue with the order - RLT responded IMMEDIATELY and corrected the situation with minimal fuss and to my satisfaction. Top marks for customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Classic Design and Function
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized set for an upcoming Christmas tea that I'm hosting at my church. Coordinates nicely with my existing dinnerware.
customer_reviews.author: Chriselle V

customer_reviews.title: To small. Looks like a child's toy.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Might be large enough for one person.
customer_reviews.author: linda sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Spoon
customer_reviews.text: Hi: I love this product but i just noticed my spoon is broken. Can you send me a new spoon?
customer_reviews.author: nadine lees

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! I wanted a small set for my coffee station and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Berry

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It is a perfect size and really great quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: justeen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tea set was very nice. I bought it for my daughter - she seemed to really like it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted. The set matches my coffee cups perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: It came so quickly. Darling set. Definitely would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple holder for sweetener packets and also needed a regular sugar bowl - white and simple. This fit the bill plus a creamer too!!! They came quickly and packaged safely - no chips or breakage. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: P. PhelpsTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking set.
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described, my only issue was the photo of the product advertised looks as if the items were photo shopped together and didn't seem to match in color. Thankfully all items did match and the sizes shown are approximately proportional as in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Comparan

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I want to write about the customer service, although the item is also very nice. I ordered this item, and it had some damage, so I returned and reordered it. The 2nd time, it had a broken piece, so I contacted the seller. They responded right away and were so helpful. They worked with me to make it right, and sent me the set with the butter dish free of charge. Very happy with what I received. The set is very beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.author: mominssf

customer_reviews.title: Quite pretty with whimsical shapes!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Larger capacity than I'd imagined - very functional and pretty. Packaged extremely well. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that the set looks great. The price was reasonable, and the packing was excellent. It's alreeady on our kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Feitelson

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and design goes with everything. Nice to have a place for the packets since so many people use artificial sweetener or Stevia these days.
customer_reviews.author: NatchitochesLa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sugar bowl is useless... it is so small a teaspoon will not fit into it..
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful....
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set. I will be proud to serve creamer and sugar in it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Porcelain White Creamer and Sugar Set is exactly as described.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted and even nicer than picture

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Classic and simple. The size was not to small either.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream and sugar set. It's simple and I like that. Glad I bought this

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that everything fits on a tray
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that everything fits on a tray. So convenient. A sugar spoon and a place for tea bags .
customer_reviews.author: Bkm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set ... bright white and nice sized pieces
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lites

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: All items arrived safely and appear the same as advertised. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered them to use at my daughter's bridal shower for hot beverage table and was very pleased with quality
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little creamer set. Ordered them to use at my daughter's bridal shower for hot beverage table and was very pleased with quality. The white porcelain goes with just about any décor and I have since used them at her rehearsal dinner, a picnic and on several occasions for impromptu coffee and dessert at my home. Easy to clean and store and I like not having to use my more elaborate creamer set now for every occasion. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: Was packaged very well and did not break. The color is not a bright white; more like a gray-white. It seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, though I didn't need the second creamer ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, though I didn't need the second creamer or sugar packet tray. Good quality, and the sizes are proportionate (not as pictured).
customer_reviews.author: armand36

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Lid and Spoon!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty set, but it is missing the lid and the spoon. I purchased the set specifically to have a suagr bowl with a lid and spoon and it is missing. I can't return it, because the packaging got thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set! Arrived in a good packaging all safe. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Beam

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: arrived broken, so not sure if this is an accurate review
customer_reviews.author: Brian Groves

product_meta.title: Porcelain White Creamer and Sugar Bowl with Lid & Spoon Plus Sweetener Packets Holder - Set of 3
product_meta.description:
Bundle of: Bia Cordon Bleu White Porcelain Sugar Bowl with Lid & Spoon, 8 oz Creamer Dispenser Pitcher and a Sweetener Sugar Packet Holder.

Beautiful whitewares are versatile. They go with any décor. This white porcelain sugar and creamer set will match what’s on the table and what you’re having for breakfast, lunch, dinner or a snack plus, it’s also extremely durable. It’s made of high quality Brazilian porcelain. This set will perfectly and beautifully sit alongside almost any spread—from a thanksgiving feast to a crumpet and tea breakfast.
feature_bullets: Set Includes: Creamer Dispenser Pitcher, Sugar Bowl with Lid & Spoon and Sugar Packets Holder
Glazed white 8 oz small ceramic pitcher is an elegant way to serve cream for coffee or tea.
White Porcelain 8 oz covered sugar bowl with a spoon is perfect for everyday use or special occasions.
Use your porcelain sugar packet holder to keep sugar packets and sweeteners organized and handy.
All Porcelain pieces are oven, broiler, microwave, freezer and dishwasher safe.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
